nest_feather.description: A feather you took from your nest upon reaching adolescence. It stands to be one of the few things that reminds you of your old home.

charred_flesh.description: A charred piece of flesh, still steaming slightly.

sewer_fungus.description: A strange fungus, found growing in the rotten bottom of the chest.

spoiled_meat.description: A spoiled, disgusting chunk of meat.

bitter_root.description: A bitter root with a foul taste.

rag_wraps.description: Dirty ragged wrappings that provide minimal protection.

glass_shard.description: A sharp fragment of broken glass, dangerous to handle.
